pr_title: Fix allow using aggregations in format()

timeline.bodyText: Rename to testAggregationInFormat to clarify this is not a generic test, but we're exercising a specific behavior.
timeline.author: martint

timeline.bodyText:
This needs to process all arguments to Format. Otherwise, the analyzer won't realize this is an invalid query:
SELECT format(s, sum(v)) FROM (VALUES ('%s', 1)) t(s, v)

(s must be in the group by clause)
timeline.author: martint

replies.bodyText: ah...thanks, will fix the code and squash the commits
